works.complaint:
Dear Google,

The above thread is publishing false reviews about a legitimate business.  
It seems Dvddropship.com is purposely posting fake information about  
esources.co.uk on the forum to defame the service. They are doing this to  
create a false impression of eSources, because it exposed that  
dropshipland.com, ukdropshipgroup.com, dpbuk.co.uk and dvddropship.com are  
duplicate services owned by the same person.
We have tried to defend our service, however the owner of the forum is  
another intermediary dropshipper, colluding with the owner of  
dropshipland.com to misinform resellers. Despite our attempts to explain  
our service, the forum purposely banned our account and started posting  
false allegations for personal gain and to deter resellers from a service  
that gives them lots more choice and therefore guides them to  
profitability. All the following comments are false or purposely fabricated.
1. “waste of money”
The poster of this comment has never tried our service. Also our real  
customers differ significantly: https://www.esources.co.uk/premiumbuyer.php
2. “most of them are already listed here in the above section”
The eSources database features over 110,000 verified sources.
